The Orphan Trains of Nebraska

Albert Lansberry

  1. Foster Name: Albert J.
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Abie
  3. Foster Family: Joe and Jennie Moore
  4. Location of Family: Anselmo, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place: Unknown
  7. Age on Arrival: 5
  8. Date of Birth: 1906-07-29, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1983-06-12, Broken Bow, NE
  10. Gender: male
  11. Spouse Name: Catherine Moore
  12. Notes: Albert was surrendered to the East Side Orphanage in New York City when he was one year old. He married Catherine Clarke in 1934; after her death in 1946, he remarried to Alice Clarke Best.
  13. Source: Gravestone, Broken Bow Cemetery, Broken Bow, NE; Custer County Chief (Broken Bow, NE), 15 June 1983.
